posts.title: Название поста
posts.fullText: Once upon a time lived fairy dragons.

textPages.body:
This demo-app was maded by asiusj for TeamLead company. jan 2020 @asiusj. 
 You can login like "Writter" using writer@example.com email and "123456" password. Here you can see you own post list. Also you can add new post, edit or delete existing post. 
And finally you can sign in like "Reader" using reader@example.com email and same "123456" password. Reader can only "like" other posts. After sign in you can sign out. 
 Without auth - app visitor have "Guest" status. He can only read posts. Hope you enjoyed.
